author: sky.cactus
content: I don't believe that 2718 defines what transaction hashes look like?

author: sky.cactus
content: Though, I believe that historically transaction hashes have always been the hash of the bytes in the transaction trie.

author: sky.cactus
content: I think your proposal is reasonable otherwise though, assuming `BLOB_TX_TYPE + ssz.serialize(tx)` is what ends up in the transaction trie in a block.  It just isn't a requirement of EIP-2718.

author: roberto.bayardo
content: Right, I guess it's more implied than specified within the section around computing the transaction root in the block header.
